author: Daniele Umoette
description: Best described as a mezcal-based Godfather with amaro and crème de banana adding depth of flavour.
name: Santa Maria (by Dani Umoette)
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro

recipeInstructions.text: Makes 2 drinks STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into two chilled shot glasses, ideally Vaso Veladora glasses
